original_text: And the men of Judah fought against Jerusalem and captured it and struck it with the edge of the sword and set the city on fire.
korean_text: 유다 자손이 예루살렘을 쳐서 점령하여 칼날로 치고 그 성을 불살랐으며

sentences.original_text: And the men of Judah fought against Jerusalem
and struck it with the edge of the sword
and set the city on fire
